pr_title: [asset] feat: add samples for SearchAllResources and SearchAllIamPolicies

timeline.message: Add samples for SearchAllResources and SearchAllIamPolicies

timeline.bodyText:
https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html#s6.2-caught-exceptions
It's better to tell folks what might go wrong than to encourage catch and ignore.  It means searchAllIamPolicies should throw ideally specific Exception(s)
timeline.author: lesv
lesv

timeline.message: Update error handling to catch specific exceptions.
Fix static analysis issues for the newly added files; Remove arguments that are not required by tests.
